sense.def:
Spite
je želja, da bi nekoga prizadeli ali vznemirili.

seg.quote: He wrote that review out of pure spite.

sense.def:
Če naredimo nekaj hudobnega
to spite someone
, tisto storimo nalašč, da bi nekoga prizadeli ali vznemirili.

seg.quote: They are being controversial to spite us.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
in spite of
napovemo podatek, zaradi katerega je naša prejšnja ali prihodnja trditev presenetljiva.

seg.quote: In spite of poor health, my father was always cheerful.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj storimo
in spite of oneself
, tisto storimo, čeprav v resnici nismo nameravali ali pričakovali.

seg.quote: Jane became edgy in spite of herself.
